title: AI Will Play Key Role In Shaping Economic Balance Between Global North and South: Microsoft's Brad Smith
description: Microsoft Vice Chair and President Brad Smith on Thursday said artificial intelligence (AI) will play a decisive role in shaping the global economic balance, particularly between the Global North and South.

title: 'India can't afford to rent intelligence': Mukesh Ambani's big pitch at AI Impact Summit | Read full speech
description: At the India AI Impact Summit 2026, Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani announced a monumental ₹10 lakh crore investment over the next seven years to drive India’s transition into the "Intelligence Era." Comparing Artificial Intelligence to the mythical Akshaya Patra, a source of limitless abundance, Ambani detailed a roadmap to democratize high-powered computing, making it as affordable and accessible as mobile data.
content: Reliance Industries chairman and managing director Mukesh Ambani made an artificial intelligence (AI) push at the India AI Impact Summit on Thursday in New Delhi, saying the country can’t depend on “renting” intelligence. His remarks comes amid a glo... [10783 chars]

title: MAHE Partners with OpenAI to Integrate Artificial Intelligence Across Teaching, Learning, and Research
description: Manipal (Karnataka) [India], February 19: Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE), an Institution of Eminence Deemed to be University, has partnered with OpenAI to integrate advanced artificial intelligence (AI) tools across teaching, research, and academic administration. This collaboration aims to enhance learning outcomes, accelerate research productivity, and equip students and faculty with critical AI skills for a rapidly evolving global workforce. MAHE will implement AI-powered tools and resources across its academic programs to support personalised learning, boost critical thinking, and encourage ethical AI use. Faculty will also gain access to advanced AI tools for curriculum planning, research, and innovation.

title: Modi Champions Ethical AI and Digital Infrastructure at India AI Impact Summit
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasized the limitless potential for unethical behavior in artificial intelligence and called for ethical use aligned with data sovereignty and transparent safety rules at the India AI Impact Summit. He also highlighted UPI's role in bridging India's digital divide, positioning technology as a service tool.

title: Push for democratised AI and stronger safety rules at India summit
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said at India's AI Impact Summit that artificial intelligence must be made widely accessible, stressing that it should serve as a tool for inclusion and empowerment, especially for countries in the Global South.
content:
NEW DELHI: Artificial intelligence has to be open to all, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi told a global AI summit on Thursday (Feb 19).
"AI has to be democratised so that humans do not just become a data point for AI or remain a raw material for ... [6370 chars]

title: AI must close the North-South gap, not widen it, says Microsoft's Brad Smith
description: Artificial intelligence presents a critical juncture for global economic equality. Microsoft's Brad Smith highlights the need for infrastructure, skilling, and local relevance to ensure AI benefits all. India is a key focus for AI infrastructure development. This technology can either bridge or deepen the gap between nations.

title: Democratisation of AI only fair and safe path forward: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman
description: New Delhi, Feb 19 (PTI) OpenAI CEO Sam Altman on Thursday said democratisation of Artificial Intelligence is the only fair and safe path forward.
